text: Menahem atrivimɨn itir dughiamɨn, Tiklat Pileser, Asirian atrivimɨn ikia, egha iza Israelia ko mɨsosi. Ezɨ Tiklat Pileserɨn ziar igharazim, Pul. Ezɨ Menahem 3,000,000 kina silva inigha, Tiklat Pileser givezasa a ganɨngi, eghtɨ a ua mɨsoghan koghɨva, egh Menahemɨn akuraghtɨ, a Israelian kantrin atrivir gavgavimɨn ikiam.
